aboutMe.intro: Hey, I'm Roxana ‚Äì A Developer with a Big Picture Perspective
aboutMe.text1: Code is my language, structure is my style, and efficiency is my philosophy. As a web and software developer, I build high-performance, scalable applications with modern technologies like TypeScript, React, Next.js, NestJS, and PostgreSQL. My focus: clean code, intuitive UX, and sustainable architecture.
aboutMe.text2: I love solving complex challenges pragmatically ‚Äì whether in the frontend, backend, or optimizing workflows. My experience as an entrepreneur and event organizer has taught me to work structured, goal-oriented, and adaptable ‚Äì qualities that are crucial in software development.
aboutMe.remoteText: My office? Wherever the best ideas come from. As a digital nomad and vanlifer, I am used to working remotely, flexibly, and independently. Efficient communication, collaborative processes, and thoughtful solutions are second nature to me ‚Äì whether working solo or in a team.
aboutMe.techStackText1: üíª Frontend: Next.js, Angular, React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, TypeScript, JavaScript
aboutMe.techStackText2: ‚öôÔ∏è Backend: Node.js, PostgreSQL, NestJS, Prisma, Python
aboutMe.techStackText3: üöÄ DevOps & Tools: Git, Supabase, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, Docker
aboutMe.techStackText4: üåé Additional: UI/UX with Figma, REST APIs
aboutMe.connectText1: I'm always looking for new challenges and exciting projects. Let's develop innovative solutions together!
aboutMe.connectText2: üì© Shoot me a message ‚Äì I look forward to hearing from you!

project1.name: Online Shop
project1.description: The project is an online shop that allows users to sell their artwork. It includes a chat function, an artist page to manage products, a search function, some filter and sorting features, and a database. Customers can also track their orders.
project1.techStack2: Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Module CSS (SCSS), Supabase (PostgreSQL), Stripe, Vercel, Chart.js

project2.name: Band Website
project2.description: The project is a classic band website that allows users to learn about the band. It consists of several pages, some with subpages or features, and a contact page that allows users to send a message to the band.
project2.techStack2: Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Module CSS, Vercel, nodemailer
